text: Brandon Valentine-Parris (born 17 April 1995) is a Vincentian sprinter. He competed in the men's 400 metres at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=2|2011 |CARIFTA Games (U17) |Montego Bay, Jamaica |4th |800
